name: Renaissance Tianjin TEDA Convention Centre Hotel

reviews.text: I have stayed in this hotel a few times now and would reccomend it, the rooms are quite nice and a good gym and swimming pool.
reviews.title: Very Nice Hotel

reviews.text: It is walking distance to various bars and restaraunts but also has a nice bar inside.
reviews.title: Great hotel for a stay in TEDA

reviews.text: This was a fantastic hotel and a great deal. The hotel itself is about 3 years old, so it's relatively new. There's also a section of the hotel that is about 1 year old, but the rooms aren't much different.
reviews.title: Renaissance Tianjin Teda

reviews.text: Access to the Club Lounge (12th Floor) is recommended, and it can be purchased on a per-day rate that is relatively cheap. The lounge access includes buffet breakfast, cocktail hour, dessert hour, and it will also give you free internet both in the lounge and your room. For the internet and breakfast alone, it's worth the upgrade.
reviews.title: The only place to stay in Tianjin TEDA

likes.disliked: — Not much to do in TEDA besides business.

reviews.text: Staff was very attentive and most spoke English well (even the bellhops). The rooms are well accented and very comfy. I will definitely plan to return here for future visits to TEDA.
reviews.title: A good hotel in Tianjin
